title: #039 - The Secret to Creating Internal & External Environments That Cause You to Thrive
itunes:title: #039 - The Secret to Creating Internal & External Environments That Cause You to Thrive
description:
We all know that the growth of any seed depends largely on its environment.

But how much care do you give to your own environment? How consciously do you cultivate your own environment for success?
